title: Vegetable Balti
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons sunflower oil', '1 medium onion, roughly chopped', '2 garlic cloves, roughly chopped', '1 (2cm) cube ginger, grated', '2 teaspoons Balti curry powder', '150g tinned chopped tomatoes', '3 tablespoons sunflower oil', '500g tofu, cut into 2cm x 2cm pieces', '1 green pepper, chopped', '150g onion, finely chopped', '1 red chilli pepper, cut into 1cm squares', '150g button mushrooms, halved', '3 teaspoons medium curry powder, ideally vegetable curry powder', '2 tablespoons tinned chopped tomatoes', '100ml water', '1 teaspooon garam masala', '1 handful coriander leaves, finely chopped']
